GendRight uses the Android Accessibility service to process your text and provide you with writing suggestions. We don't and will not sell your data. 

GendRight uses the following Accessibility capabilities:

Retrieve your typed text:

 This is required for GendRight to provide writing suggestions in supported apps.

Detect window changed:

This is required to turn GendRight on or off when you're typing in apps. 

Enabling the shortcut toggle on this screen is NOT required.

As you type, get alternative suggestions when potentially gender unsafe phrases are detected.
